caption: The ocean floor holds a sunken ship while a massive cruise liner floats on the surface. Beneath the ship, many people and vehicles are gathered. Inside, a group of people smokes and plays cards. Suddenly, they collect their money and rush madly towards the ship. Some individuals board the ship through the gangways, and those on the ship wave to them from above. The cruise liner starts to depart from the dock. Inside a lavishly decorated room, many servants are tidying up, arranging paintings in the room. Soon, the evening arrives, and a large crowd gathers in the hall.
